original_text: and dip his right finger in the oil that is in his left hand and sprinkle some oil with his finger seven times before the Lord.
korean_text: 오른쪽 손가락으로 왼쪽 손의 기름을 찍어 그 손가락으로 그것을 여호와 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and dip his right finger in the oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 오른손 손가락을 기름에 담그고

sentences.original_text: that is in his left hand
and sprinkle some oil with his finger
